name: Shop Of The Day
description: Check the Shop Of The Day for Fortnite  No need to open the game anymore !   With this app you can :  See the time remaining before new items  Subscribe to items to be notified when it is available again !  Available in all languages (from the game) !  See if a item is new (first occurrence in the shop)  See item bigger and outfits backpack!  See emotes and dances on Youtube   You need a internet connection to use the app.  Disclaimer Portions of the materials used are trademarks and/or copyrighted works of Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved by Epic. This material is not official and is not endorsed by Epic.
